Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.components

Class NodeComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.render3d.components.NodeComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class NodeComponent
extends Object
implements Component
    Represents the node component that describes hierarchical relationships among objects. This class is inherited from Component.

    Concepts such as child and parent nodes are used to describe the hierarchy of objects in a scene.

    Since:
    3
